TopicTitle: The game loaded SO quickly before the patch, now the new intro screens take forever.

Articles.Content: It seems like the logo screens take twice as long as before, and there's a new warning screen that fades in and out veeeeeeeeerrrrrrrrrrrrrrry slowly.  The team has done an amazing job at making the actual load times super quick, but then you preface it with these additional unskippable screens.  I timed it out, the actual loading takes just 3 seconds, but the entire process takes 30.
The logos take the same time. The epilepsy warning just takes 14 seconds (yes I counted). I don't need it every time I start the game so a on/off switch would be nice.

No, the logos are slower too.  The total time has gone from about 10 seconds to about 30 seconds.

Loading was painfully slow in KSP 1, I was really enjoying the quick load times of KSP 2.  It still loads super fast when changing scenes, but it would be great if we could skip the intros.  Many games have a -novid or -nointro command line switch, or something similar.  Or just let us press ESC.
They added optimizations for loading from the main menu faster and then they add the warning that negates all the benefits of the optimization.
Give the ability to skip logos by clicking enter or other buttons, please
